enb_long_title: Expert meeting on methodologies for technology needs assessments
section_title: A BRIEF HISTORY OF THE UNFCCC AND TECHNOLOGY TRANSFER
sentences: Climate change is considered one of the most serious threats to the sustainability of the world's environment, human health and well-being, and the global economy.
Mainstream scientists agree that the Earth's climate is being affected by the build-up of greenhouse gases, such as carbon dioxide, caused by human activities.
A majority of scientists believe that prompt precautionary action is necessary.
